input.description: The name of the adapter to use to handle the request. Default adapter name: HPSCActor.

The items for the adapter request. This should be an XML document with a root element named "items" having a child "item", which should contain the data necessary to execute the specific request. To execute multiple item, give multiple <item> element in the <items> element.
Close Interaction
This wrapper closes an interaction record. Sample Item Xml:
<items> <item> <operation-name>close-interaction</operation-name> <model> <keys> <call-i-d> <value>Incident1005</value> <type>String</type> </call-i-d> </keys> <instance> <call-i-d> <value>Incident1005</value> <type>String</type> </call-i-d> <callback-contact> <value>PETERS, JEFF</value> <type>String</type> </callback-contact> <notify-by> <value>notify by</value> <type>String</type> </notify-by> <category> <value>telecoms</value> <type>String</type> </category> <subcategory> <value>fixed infrastructure</value> <type>String</type> </subcategory> <product-type> <value>fixed infrastructure</value> <type>String</type> </product-type> <problem-type> <value>none</value> <type>String</type> </problem-type> <assignment-group> <type>Array</type> <assignment-group> <element> <value>AUTO</value> <type>String</type> </element> <element> <value>AUTO</value> <type>String</type> </element> </assignment-group> </assignment-group> <initial-impact> <value>1</value> <type>String</type> </initial-impact> <severity> <value>1</value> <type>String</type> </severity> <description> <type>Array</type> <description> <element> <value>description line 1</value> <type>String</type> </element> <element> <value>description line 2</value> <type>String</type> </element> </description> </description> <open-time> <value>2008.11.01 08:00:00</value> <type>DateTime</type> </open-time> <update-time> <value>2008.11.01 08:00:00</value> <type>DateTime</type> </update-time> <opened-by> <value>opened by</value> <type>String</type> </opened-by> <configuration-item> <value>ACME Phone 0001</value> <type>String</type> </configuration-item> <call-owner> <value>Call owner</value> <type>String</type> </call-owner> <status> <value>Status</value> <type>String</type> </status> <resolution> <type>Array</type> <resolution> <element> <value>resolution type line 1</value> <type>String</type> </element> <element> <value>resolution type line 2</value> <type>String</type> </element> </resolution> </resolution> <caller-department> <value>caller deparment</value> <type>String</type> </caller-department> <caller-location> <value>caller location</value> <type>String</type> </caller-location> <close-time> <value>2008.11.01 08:00:00</value> <type>DateTime</type> </close-time> <closed-by> <value>closed by</value> <type>String</type> </closed-by> <knowledge-candidate> <value>true</value> <type>Boolean</type> </knowledge-candidate> <SLAAgreement-i-d> <value>1</value> <type>Int</type> </SLAAgreement-i-d> <priority> <value>1</value> <type>String</type> </priority> <service-contract> <value>1</value> <type>Int</type> </service-contract> <sysmodtime> <value>2008.12.28 03:01:26</value> <type>DateTime</type> </sysmodtime> <site-category> <value>site category</value> <type>String</type> </site-category> <total-loss-of-service> <value>true</value> <type>Boolean</type> </total-loss-of-service> <failed-entitlement> <value>true</value> <type>Boolean</type> </failed-entitlement> <contact-location> <value>contact location</value> <type>String</type> </contact-location> <cause-code> <value>cause code</value> <type>String</type> </cause-code> <resolution-code> <value>resolution code</value> <type>String</type> </resolution-code> <company> <value>company</value> <type>String</type> </company> <contact-name> <value>PETERS, JEFF</value> <type>String</type> </contact-name> <reported-by-contact> <value>PETERS, JEFF</value> <type>String</type> </reported-by-contact> <reported-by-different-contact> <value>true</value> <type>Boolean</type> </reported-by-different-contact> <reported-by-phone> <value>reported by phone</value> <type>String</type> </reported-by-phone> <reported-by-extension> <value>reported by extension</value> <type>String</type> </reported-by-extension> <reported-by-fax> <value>reported by fax</value> <type>String</type> </reported-by-fax> <contact-email> <value>contact email</value> <type>String</type> </contact-email> <location-full-name> <value>location full name</value> <type>String</type> </location-full-name> <contact-first-name> <value>contact first name</value> <type>String</type> </contact-first-name> <contact-last-name> <value>contact last name</value> <type>String</type> </contact-last-name> <contact-time-zone> <value>contact time zone</value> <type>String</type> </contact-time-zone> <entered-by-e-s-s> <value>true</value> <type>Boolean</type> </entered-by-e-s-s> <SLABreached> <value>true</value> <type>Boolean</type> </SLABreached> <next-s-l-a-breach> <value>2004.11.01 08:00:00</value> <type>DateTime</type> </next-s-l-a-breach> <update> <type>Array</type> <update> <element> <value>update line 1</value> <type>String</type> </element> </update> </update> <needed-by-time> <value>2004.11.01 08:00:00</value> <type>DateTime</type> </needed-by-time> <approval-status> <value>approval status</value> <type>Status</type> </approval-status> <s-l-a-agreement-i-d> <value>1</value> <type>Int</type> </s-l-a-agreement-i-d> <s-l-a-breached> <value>true</value> <type>Boolean</type> </s-l-a-breached> </instance> </model> </item> </items> Elements’ Description:
Operation-name [Required]: Valid values: <operation-name>close-interaction</operation-name>
Call-i-d [Required]: Valid values: any string.
callback-contact [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
notify-by [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
Incident-category [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
subcategory [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
product-type [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
problem-type [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
assignment-group [Optional]: Valid values: It's an array type element with each element be any string.
Initial-impact [Optional]: Valid values: any string. Existing entries:
1, 2, 3, 4. 1 > Enterprise, 2 > Site/Dept, 3 > Multiple User, 4 > User.
Severity[Optional]:
Valid values: any string. Existing entries: 1, 2, 3, 4. 1 > critical, 2 > high, 3 > average, 4 > low.
Description [Optional]: Valid values: It's an array type of element with each of its element of string type.
open-time [Optional]: Valid values: any input in date time format.
update-time [Optional]: Valid values: any input in date time format.
Opened-by [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
configuration-item [Optional]: Valid values: Any string.
call-owner [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
status [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
Resolution [Optional]: Valid values: It's an array type of element with each of its input of string type.
caller-department [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
caller-location [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
close-time [Optional]: Valid values: any input in date time format.
Closed-by [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
knowledge-candidate [Optional]: Valid values: true, false.
SLAAgreement-i-d [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
Priority [Optional]: Valid values: any string. Existing entries: 1, 2, 3, 4. 1 > Enterprise, 2 > Site/Dept, 3 > Multiple User, 4 > User
Service-contract [Optional]: Valid values: any input of format “Int” (Integer.)
sysmodtime [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
site-category [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
total-loss-of-service [Optional]: Valid values: true, false.
failed-entitlement [Optional]: Valid values: true, false.
Contact-location [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
cause-code [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
resolution-code [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
company [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
contact-name [Optional]: Valid value: any string.
reported-by-contact [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
reported-by-different-contact [Optional]: Valid value: true, false.
Reported-by-phone [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
reported-by-extension [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
reported-by-fax [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
contact-email [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
location-full-name [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
contact-first-name [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
contact-last-name [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
contact-time-zone [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
entered-by-e-s-s [Optional]: Valid values: true, false.
SLABreached [Optional]: Valid values: true, false.
Next-s-l-a-breach [Optional]: Valid values: any input in “DateTime”.
update [Optional]: Valid values: It's an array type element with each of its element of “String” type.
needed-by-time [Optional]: Valid values: any input in date time format.
approval-status [Optional]: Valid values: any string.
s-l-a-agreement-i-d [Optional]: Valid Values: : Any integer values. These integer values are mapped to string values in application. The list of these mappings is customizable, i.e., more entries can be added to/deleted from it.
In out-of-box setup following mappings are available:
155 -> ACME Bronze 156 -> ACME Gold 157 -> ACME Platinum 158 -> ACME Silver 159 -> DEFAULT Bronze 160 -> DEFAULT Gold 161 -> DEFAULT Platinum 162 -> DEFAULT Silver 104 -> GEN Bronze 102 -> GEN Gold 101 -> GEN Platinum 103 -> GEN Silver 154 -> PRGN Bronze 152 -> PRGN Gold 151 -> PRGN Platinum 153 -> PRGN Silver
Here, if '155' is provided as value in item xml, on the application the value of this field will be 'ACME Bronze'
s-l-a-breached [Optional]: Valid values: true, false.

Provide username/password in form of xml.
This input parameter is required when the user wants to override the default values for username and password provided in the adapter configuration. This is required for cases where an operation cannot be executed with the default username/password provided in the adapter configuration and only user with special permissions can execute the operation. Examples of such operations can be - 'approve-change', 'deny-change', 'close-change', 'approve-task'
Sample XML Format:
<connection-parameters> <alternate-username>USERNAME</alternate-username> <alternate-password>PASSWORD</alternate-password> </connection-parameters>

output.description: The adapter response containing the results.

xslt-stylesheet.stylesheet: <xsl:stylesheet xmlns:xsl="http://www.w3.org/1999/XSL/Transform" version="1.0"> <xsl:output indent="no" /> <xsl:template match="/"> <request-data> <hp-service-center-request> <xsl:if test="string('${username}') != ''"> <username>${username}</username> </xsl:if> <xsl:if test="string('${username}') != ''"> <password>${password}</password> </xsl:if> <entity> <xsl:text disable-output-escaping="no">servicedesk</xsl:text> </entity> <entity-type> <xsl:copy-of select="(//entity-type)[1]/text()" /> </entity-type> <request> <operation-name> <xsl:copy-of select="(//operation-name)[1]/text()" /> </operation-name> <xsl:for-each select="/items/item"> <parameters> <xsl:element name="${request element}"> <xsl:copy-of select="./model" /> </xsl:element> </parameters> </xsl:for-each> </request> </hp-service-center-request> </request-data> </xsl:template> </xsl:stylesheet>

documentation.description:
Close Interaction
This wrapper closes an interaction record.
